name: Shaped (Dain Gabriel)
description:
Shaped is a 3D puzzle game in which players are given the jumbled up shape of an object and are required to figure out what the object is by rotating the jumbled pieces. This is a prototype and as such there is a very limited number of puzzles. I hope you enjoy!

USEFUL INFO

The game only requires a mouse to play. Left click on objects to rotate them. The Escape button can be used to close the application.

CREDIT

This game was a solo effort by Dain Gabriel.
